events.title: Glendalough Gin
events.location: 57 The Headline, 57 Clanbrassil Street Lower, Dublin 8
events.tickets: €20 in advance, from The Headline Bar, or on Eventbrite.
events.description:
Nobody captures the Irish countryside in a bottle better than Glendalough Distillery. Every season, working with local forager Geraldine Kavanagh, they spend a week in the wilds of the Wicklow countryside foraging for the freshest and most interesting local botanicals, berries and fruit which they distil into four unique and delicious seasonal gins.

Come taste the results, meet Geraldine and distiller Ciarán "Rowdy" Rooney, and discover that gin truly is a Winter drink. And a Spring drink, and a Summer drink, and an Autumn drink!

events.title: Big & Bold
events.location: 57 The Headline, 57 Clanbrassil Street Lower, Dublin 8
events.tickets: €20 in advance, from The Headline Bar, or on Eventbrite.
events.description:
For the last tasting of 2016 we are going Big! And Bold!

Eoin Bara, owner and distiller of Arderin Distillery in Tullamore, will present the brand new Mór Irish Gin.

From "Mór", which means "Big" in Ireland, we will hop across the Atlantic for a couple of gins that are "Big" in America.

We'll finish with a special edition of Bulldog Gin which takes an already assertive spirit at 40% and amps it up to 47%.

samples.title: Mór Irish Gin
samples.description: The botanicals include juniper, angelica, coriander, rosemary, cranberry, raspberry and blackberrry.

samples.title: Big Gin
samples.description: botanicals: juniper, coriander, biter orange peel, grains of paradise, angelica, cassia, orris, cardamom and Tasmanian pepperberry. Batch distilled in a 100-gallon Vendome pot still by third-generation distiller, Ben Capdevielle.

samples.title: Boubon Barrelled Big Gin
samples.description: botanicals: juniper, coriander, biter orange peel, grains of paradise, angelica, cassia, orris, cardamom and Tasmanian pepperberry. Batch distilled in a 100-gallon Vendome pot still by third-generation distiller, Ben Capdevielle, then finished for 6 months in ex-Kenticky bourbon casks.

samples.title: Bulldog Bold Gin
samples.description: botanicals: juniper, angelica, coriander, lemon peel, orris, almond, cassia, liquorice, lavender, white poppy, lotus leaves, dragon eye (longan).

events.title: An Evening with Blackwater Distillery
events.location: 57 The Headline, 57 Clanbrassil Street Lower, Dublin 8
events.tickets: €20 in advance, from The Headline Bar, or on Eventbrite.
events.description:
Blackwater has been setting the pace among Ireland's new distilleries for quality, integrity and innovation. Since getting underway in early 2015, it has already released three gins, two vodkas, and a poitín distilled from the local stout. And there's more on the way.

Expect some amazing flavours and plain speaking on the spirits business from owner and distiller, Peter Mulryan, as we work our way through the Blackwater Gin range.

samples.title: Blackwater No. 5
samples.description: A classic, London Dry-style gin, with a recipe based on the import catalogue of White's of Waterford in the 19th Century. It includes juniper, coriander, cinnamon, liquorice and nutmeg.

samples.title: Blackwater Strawberry Gin
samples.description: Wexford strawberries have been macerated in alcohol and distilled along with the rest of the botanicals. After distillation, blackcurrants and more strawberries are added to produce a wonderful nose and colour.

samples.title: Blackwater Juniper Cask Gin
samples.description: A gin rested in casks that Blackwater had specially made from juniper wood.

samples.title: Boyle's Gin
samples.description: A preview of Blackwater's latest gin before it hits the shelves. Named for local boy and father of modern chemistry, Robert Boyle, this gin is softer, fruitier and sweeter than No.5. Botanicals include apple, rosehip, blackcurrant and pink peppercorns.

events.title: Dutch Gin Tasting
events.location: 57 The Headline, 57 Clanbrassil Street Lower, Dublin 8
events.tickets: €20 in advance, from The Headline Bar, or on Eventbrite.
events.description: We look back at the originators of gin, the Dutch, intrepid traders with the rest of the world who brought back exotic spices to Holland with which to flavour their spirits. We'll taste the precursor of gin, genever, still a popular drink in the Netherlands today. We'll also sample some Dutch takes on modern gin, accompanied by a new tonic to the Irish market, Double Dutch.

samples.title: Cooley Poitín
samples.description: A spirit made from a mix of malted and unmalted grain, distilled in copper stills. Similar to the base spirit used to make genever.

samples.title: Bobby's Schiedam Dry Gin
samples.botanicals: juniper, lemongrass, cloves, coriander seed, cubeb pepper, cinnamon, rose hips, fennel seed

samples.title: Zuidam Dutch Courage
samples.botanicals: juniper berries and iris root from Italy, coriander from Morocco, angelica, sweet oranges and fresh whole lemons from Spain, liquorice root from India, cardamom and whole vanilla beans from Madagascar

samples.title: Zuidam Dutch Courage Aged Gin
samples.botanicals: juniper berries and iris root from Italy, coriander from Morocco, angelica, sweet oranges and fresh whole lemons from Spain, liquorice root from India, cardamom and whole vanilla beans from Madagascar.

events.title: American Gin Tasting
events.location: The Palace Bar, 21 Fleet Street, Dublin 2
events.description:
At our inaugural tasting, we will discover what's been happening across the Atlantic, from robust classic gins to contemporary concoctions that challenge our notions of gin.

We'll also take a closer look at two botanicals: juniper and Indian sarsaparilla.

samples.title: Death's Door Gin
samples.distillery: Death's Door Distillery, Middleton, Wisconsin, USA

samples.title: Cold River Gin
samples.distillery: Maine Distilleries, Freeport (just outside Portland), Maine, USA
samples.botanicals: juniper, coriander seed, lemon & orange peel, cardamom, angelica root, orris root

samples.title: Aviation Gin
samples.distillery: House Spirits Distillery, Portland, Oregon, USA
samples.botanicals: juniper, coriander seed, cardamom, lavender, sarsaparilla, anise seed, bitter & sweet orange peel

samples.title: FEW American Gin
samples.botanicals: 11 botanicals, including juniper, citrus lemon & orange peel, Tahitian vanilla, cassia, grains of paradise, home-growm hops
